definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Besides, who likes to look at the old baldhead?
Tinea capitis is manifested by pustular eruptions of the scalp, with scaling and bald patches.
sentences.chinese: 头癣是补丁表现为脓疱爆发的秃头头皮，具有缩放和。

sentences.english: Baldy's face flushed, and he sat down and tucked into the meat instead.
sentences.chinese: 那秃头脸上一红，坐下来抓起牛肉便吃。

sentences.english: He was a short bald man with a big spare tyre and smelled of cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 他是个矮个子秃头，腰间一圈赘肉，浑身烟味。

sentences.english: He is the bald-headed, sunburned gentleman WHO dumped the pail of garbage, without any doubt.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，他就是那位倒过一桶垃圾的秃头黑脸绅士。

sentences.english: What hair remained on his balding head stuck out untidily.
sentences.chinese: 残留在秃头上的稀发乱七八糟地挓挲着。

sentences.english: Being thus ironical and bald, he was the leader.
sentences.chinese: 因此，尽管秃头，爱讽刺，他倒做了领袖。

sentences.english: I am bald and I agreed to be the spokesman for a toupee company.
sentences.chinese: 我是秃头，我同意为一家假发公司做代言人。

sentences.english: Male-Pattern Baldness Found Rooted in Stem Cells.
sentences.chinese: 科学家研究用干细胞培植发囊治疗男性秃头。

sentences.english: The actor shaved his head off in order to portray a bald man.
sentences.chinese: 为扮演一个秃头男人，演员把他自己的头发剃光了。

sentences.english: Mountain already bald, please infuse into hair restorer.
sentences.chinese: 山坡已经秃头了，请灌入生发剂。

sentences.english: Grandpa is bald-headed except for a few sparse hairs.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷的秃头上仅有几根发。

sentences.english: Besides, who likes to look at the old baldhead ?
sentences.chinese: 此外，谁都喜欢看老秃头吗？

sentences.english: The young man always wears a cap, because he is bare-headed.
sentences.chinese: 这个年轻人总是戴着帽子，因为他是秃头。

sentences.english: Well, I'll go to bed early, but Malfoy will get bald one day.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我会早点睡的，不过马尔福总有一天会秃头的。

sentences.english: Sineide and Luo Ben be a baldhead?
sentences.chinese: 斯内德和罗本都是秃头么？

definition: beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
yellow face (due to sickness etc)/yellow-skinned people
